3.unformattedText: Please don't [url=https://en.scratch-wiki.info/wiki/Blockspam]Blockspam.[/url], instead, use the [url=https://scratch.mit.edu/discuss/topic/438916/]Scratchblocks Testing Topic.[/url]

4.unformattedText: Please post these types of questions in the [url=https://scratch.mit.edu/discuss/4/]Questions about Scratch forum.[/url]

5.unformattedText: You may want to try using [url=https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLy4zsTUHwGJIqB6hg-sOxiwsJn7UfuCLw]@griffpatch's scrolling platformer tutorials[/url]

6.unformattedText: Hi - It looks like you have post this in the wrong forum. In the future - please post these types of questions in the [url=https://scratch.mit.edu/discuss/7/]Help with Scripts forum.[/url]

7.unformattedText: If you're looking to curate the front page (an FPC), here's a [url=https://scratch.mit.edu/studios/386359/]link[/url]! If you want your projects to be curated, you just have to be lucky ;)

8.unformattedText: Being a Scratch Team member is a full-time working [url=https://www.scratchfoundation.org/opportunities/]job[/url] for adults.
